## Bio

Janavi Kolpekwar is a Statistics & Data Sciences student at UT Austin with a passion for building at the intersection of AI, healthcare, and technology. She has worked on cancer diagnostics, developed software at Siemens EDA, and created EchoEase, an AI-driven tinnitus relief app. On campus, she helps lead Texas Guadaloop and Texas Enactus, and outside of work she enjoys tennis, music, and exploring new projects that blend creativity with tech.
